Package curam.util.client.domain.marshal

Contains functionality that allows the assembly of data that was split over several form fields by a renderer plug-in into a single value that can be submitted to the application server after parsing by the converter.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DomainMarshal
    A domain marshal takes form data submitted by a user and converts it into a format that can be used to set a property of a BOPI.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDomainMarshal
    A base class for domain marshals.
    AddressMarshal
    A domain marshal for addresses.
    BirthdateMarshal
    A domain marshal for the 'birthday' date.
    DateTimeMarshal
    A domain marshal for date time types.
    SimpleXPathADCMarshal
    A marshal for string values that represent XML documents.
    SimpleXPathMarshal
    A marshal for string values that represent XML documents.
    SimpleXPathMarshal.DOMContextHelper
    A helper class that stores the DOM context node.
    TextMarshal
    A simple marshal for domains with simple values.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MarshalException
    Exception class for data marshalling problems.

Package curam.util.client.domain.marshal Description

Contains functionality that allows the assembly of data that was split over several form fields by a renderer plug-in into a single value that can be submitted to the application server after parsing by the converter.
